snippet: Butler has promoted the former player and assistant coach Brandon Miller to fill the vacancy left by Brad Stevens, who was hired to coach the Boston Celtics.
abstract: Butler promotes former player and assistant coach Brandon Miller replace Brad Stevens as men's basketball head coach.
lead_paragraph: Butler has promoted the former player and assistant coach Brandon Miller to fill the vacancy left by Brad Stevens, who was hired to coach the Boston Celtics.

headline.main: Butler Hires a Coach to Replace Stevens
